title: Summer Squash Mushroom Casserole Recipe Read Reviews (65) Be the first to add a review 4.5 65
directions: In a large skillet, saute the summer squash, zucchini, mushrooms and onion in oil until tender; drain.

In a large bowl, combine the vegetable mixture, cheese, soup, sour cream and salt. Transfer to a greased 11-in. x 7-in. baking dish. Combine cracker crumbs and butter. Sprinkle over vegetable mixture.
Bake, uncovered, at 350Â° for 25-30 minutes or until bubbly. Yield: 10 servings.
ingredients: 1 can (10-3/4 ounces) condensed cream of mushroom soup, undiluted
